item.title: Inflation data to Trump tariffs: Top 5 triggers for the Indian stock market this week

review.headline_rewrite: Inflation data to Trump tariffs: Top 5 triggers for the Indian stock market this week
bullets: Stock market next week: The Indian stock market closed flat on Friday, September 5, as profit booking persisted amid concerns over Trump tariffs and
The Sensex edged down 7 points to settle at 80,710.76, while the Nifty 50 inched up by 7 points to close at 24,741.
The BSE Midcap index slipped 0.10 per cent, whereas the Smallcap index gained 0.09 per cent.

item.title: Court restrains reporters, activists from publishing defamatory content against Adani Enterprises

review.headline_rewrite: Court restrains reporters, activists from publishing defamatory content against Adani Enterprises
bullets: In a significant relief to Adani Enterprises Limited (AEL), a Delhi court on Saturday passed an interim order restraining a group of journalists, activists
AEL's counsel Vijay Aggarwal argued in the court that unchecked dissemination of baseless allegations had not only tarnished the company's reputation but also caused
The court said the plaintiff's grievance was that the alleged defamatory articles could cause strain to its balance sheet, delay execution of projects, wipe
"To the extent that the articles and posts are incorrect and unverified and prima facie defamatory, defendant nos 1 to 10 are also directed

item.title: Burley’s collapse is a warning — farmers can’t be left to markets alone

review.headline_rewrite: Burley’s collapse is a warning — farmers can’t be left to markets alone
bullets: In Andhra Pradesh’s tobacco heartland, the mood has shifted from quiet confidence to deep anxiety.
For decades, the State’s farmers have balanced tradition with the demands of global markets, supplying both Burley varieties and Flue-Cured Virginia (FCV) to buyers
But the sudden collapse in HD Burley prices has cut farmer earnings by half in just one season, pushing entire communities to the brink.
